questions:
Name the Latin combination of words that hides behind the translation "unrestricted violence".
*summo cum imperio*

Indicate the appropriate Latin phrase for the wording "offer of money".
*condicio pecuniae*

Give the Latin text passage for "has brought away".
*deduxerit*
text:
Praeclarum est enim summo cum imperio fuisse in Asia triennium sic, ut nullum te signum, nulla pictura, nullum vas, [...] nulla condicio pecuniae, quibus rebus abundat ista provincia, ab summa integritate continentiaque deduxerit


It is something very special to have had such unrestricted violence in the province of Asia for three years that no statue, no picture, no vase, [...] no offer of money has brought you away from your absolute incorruptibility and self-control, even though your province offers all these things in abundance.
